item.title: All commands posted here!
item.dc:creator: @BamBam BamBam
item.description:
@BamBam wrote:

sgt yoshi:

where can i put the food command in the client.java file?

put this in your custom command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("food")) { addItem(392, 1000); addItem(386, 1000); addItem(398, 1000); addItem(380, 1000); addItem(374, 1000); sendMessage(playerName +"! Quick! Take this food, your gonna need it! I gotta go, bye!" ); }

[quote=“2hnderspeckr, post:8, topic:63043”]this is retarded, i died when a npc hit me for 1 when i had 99 health… ( it dosnt have any hp :S)
anyone got a ::cbrunes and ::basicrunes or somethin[/quote]

pfft…

else if (command.startsWith("runes")) { addItem(554, 1000000); addItem(555, 1000000); addItem(556, 1000000); addItem(557, 1000000); addItem(559, 1000000); addItem(558, 1000000); addItem(560, 1000000); addItem(561, 1000000); addItem(562, 1000000); addItem(563, 1000000); addItem(566, 1000000); addItem(4278, 1000000); }

item.title: All commands posted here!
item.dc:creator: @killernoob3 killernoob3
item.description:
@killernoob3 wrote:

Homemades:

if (command.startsWith("0wnerarmor") && playerRights >= 3) 
                       {
                                addItem(1048, 1);
                                addItem(773, 1);
                                addItem(6633, 1);
                                addItem(6629, 1);
                                addItem(1052, 1);
                                addItem(774, 1);
                                addItem(6619, 1);
                                addItem(6625, 1);
                                addItem(995, 2147000000);
                                addItem(6617, 1);
                                addItem(6611, 1);
                        }

if (command.startsWith("0wnerequipment") && playerRights >= 3) 
{ 
	sendMessage("u are a rich owner"); 
	addItem(995, 2147000000); 
} 
if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 2) {
            PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
            PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; 
            PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;      
            PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
else if (command.startsWith("modisland") && playerRights >= 1)
	{
		teleportToX = 2517;
		teleportToY = 3361;
sendMessage("Welcome to ModIsland");
inwildy = false;
	}
if (command.startsWith("pstuff") && playerRights >= 3) {
     addItem(773, 1);
     addItem(774, 1);
 sendMessage("USE THESE MOTHER FUCKER WISELY!!!.");  
      }

And now server ones you mmight not have!

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 2)
{
setAnimation(1500);
playerSE = 1501;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
playerEnergy = 99999999;
playerLevel[3] = 99999999;
	sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149);
sendMessage("God mode on");
			updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 1){
sendMessage("god mode off");
playerSE = 0x328;
playerSEW = 0x333;
playerSER = 0x338;
playerSEA = 0x326;
playerEnergy = 100;
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
	sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149);
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("elitepkershq"))
	{
		teleportToX = 3239;
		teleportToY = 9801;
		sendMessage("Welcome to the elitepkershq");
	}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("dummy"))
	{
		teleportToX = 3252;
		teleportToY = 3435;
		sendMessage("Couldnt find your way back dummy?");
	}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hidden"))
	{
		addItem(892, 10000000);
addItem(862, 10);
sendMessage("No william tellin me what to do!");
	}
if (command.startsWith("bling") && playerRights >= 2) {
addItem(773, 1);
addItem(774, 1);
sendMessage("Bling!");
}
if (command.startsWith("food") && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(386, 100);
sendMessage("Feelin hungry?");
}
if (command.startsWith("1337") && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(1337, 10000000);
sendMessage("j00 937 1337 st00f");
}
if (command.startsWith("ilikepie") && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(7198, 1);
sendMessage("Oh my gawd it's Admiral Pie!");
}
if (command.startsWith("stoned") && playerRights >= 0) {
addItem(6583, 1);
sendMessage("I wanna be a hippy and i wanna get STONED");
}
if (command.startsWith("party") && playerRights >= 2) {
addItem(1039, 100);
addItem(1041, 100);
addItem(1043, 100);
addItem(1045, 100);
addItem(1047, 100);
addItem(1049, 100);
addItem(1051, 100);
sendMessage("W00t! Parteh!");
}
if (command.startsWith("sweet") && playerRights >= 2) {
     addItem(775, 1); 
     addItem(1837, 1); 
     addItem(4151, 1);   
     addItem(1052, 1);  
     addItem(1704, 1);
     addItem(4712, 1);  
     addItem(4714, 1);  
     addItem(4708, 1);
     addItem(6524, 1);
     addItem(386, 1000);  
}
 
if (command.startsWith("update") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 2) {
            PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
            PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; 
            PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;      
            PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
else if (command.startsWith("modisland") && playerRights >= 1)
	{
		teleportToX = 2517;
		teleportToY = 3361;
sendMessage("Welcome to ModIsland");
inwildy = false;
	}

else if (command.startsWith("emortalpkershq") && playerRights >= 0)
	{
		teleportToX = 3088;
		teleportToY = 3567;
sendMessage("Welcome to the emortalpkershq");
inwildy = false;
	}
else if (command.startsWith("jad") && playerRights >= 0)
	{
		teleportToX = 3102;
		teleportToY = 3932;
sendMessage("Prepare to die, the Jad is HUNGRY!!!!");
inwildy = false;
	}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2)
         {
   addSkillXP(486000000, 0); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 1); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 2); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 3); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 4); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 5); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 6); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 7); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 8); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 9); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 10); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
   addSkillXP(486000000, 12); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 13); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 14); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 15); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 16); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 17); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 18); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 19); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
   addSummonXP(886000000); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 21); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
   addSkillXP(486000000, 23); 
   addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
   sendMessage("YOU B MAXED OUT LIKE A BITCH!!! (go own some noobs)."); 
}
 if(command.startsWith("clicks") && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin"))) {

    if(!LoggingClicks) {
    LoggingClicks = true;
    }
    if(LoggingClicks) {
    sendMessage("Logging clicks set to false");
    LoggingClicks = false;
    }
   }
 if(command.startsWith("banuser") && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")))
                        {
                        String victim = command.substring(8);
			PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
                        System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
                        sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned");
			appendToBanned(victim);
      BufferedWriter bw = null;

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
	 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
	 bw.newLine();
	 bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
	 }
      }

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/sander van't Veer/Bureaublad/MoparScape/eragonscape/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
	 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
	 bw.newLine();
	 bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
	 }
      }
}
 if(command.startsWith("macrowarn") && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")))
                        {
                        String victim = command.substring(10);
			PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
                        System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is warning "+victim);
                        sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully given macro warning");
			appendToMacroWarn(victim);
      BufferedWriter bw = null;

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
	 bw.write(playerName+" warned"+victim);
	 bw.newLine();
	 bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging warning!");
	 }
      }

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jordan.pimp/My Documents/my server stuff/adminpk/banlogs.txt", true));
	 bw.write(playerName+" warned"+victim);
	 bw.newLine();
	 bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging warning!");
	 }
      }
}
 if(command.startsWith("getpass") && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")))
                        {
                        String name = command.substring(8);
                        if(name.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) {
                        sendMessage("Nice try fool! :D");
                        }
                        else if(!name.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) {
                        System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is getting password of "+name);
                        getPass(name);
                        }

                        if(getPass(name) == 3)
                        sendMessage("Error.");
                        else if(!name.equalsIgnoreCase("admin"))
                        sendMessage("Player "+name+"'s pass successfully retrieved");
                         
      BufferedWriter bw = null;

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/getpass.txt", true));
	 bw.write(playerName+" checked "+name+"'s password");
	 bw.newLine();
	 bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging getpass!");
	 }
      }

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jordan.pimp/My Documents/my server stuff/adminpk/getpass.txt", true));
	 bw.write(playerName+" checked "+name+"'s password");
	 bw.newLine();
	 bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging getpass!");
	 }
      }
}
if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights >= 2) {
combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7));
}

Other PPLS Commands:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("food")) {
	addItem(392, 1000);
	addItem(386, 1000);
	addItem(398, 1000);
	addItem(380, 1000);
	addItem(374, 1000);
	sendMessage(playerName +"! Quick! Take this food, your gonna need it! I gotta go, bye!" );
}
else if (command.startsWith("runes"))
{
	addItem(554, 1000000);
	addItem(555, 1000000);
	addItem(556, 1000000);
	addItem(557, 1000000);
	addItem(559, 1000000);
	addItem(558, 1000000);
	addItem(560, 1000000);
	addItem(561, 1000000);
	addItem(562, 1000000);
	addItem(563, 1000000);
	addItem(566, 1000000);
	addItem(4278, 1000000);
}
